title: Patch 5.1 Bugs Megathread
body:
Hello Everyone,

We are here and waiting to respond to any first day patch issues you may encounter. If you do encounter any bugs after patching, please post them here for our team to investigate.

Also, you may want to check reddit as well: http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2siyrp/51_patch_bugs_megathread/

Thank you,
Riot Cochese

Updates:

* Maokai is currently disabled and a fix is being explored at this time.

replies.body:
Hi Everyone,

We're aware that firewall errors after champ select are on the rise and for some of you this only started occurring after 5.1. We've known [this fix](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq9) to have some success but it does not work for everyone. We are investigating this issue and will try to keep everyone updated on the status.

Other **possible** workarounds:

- Player Maclman mentioned that [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq9) works for them most of the time.
- If the error appears, immediately switch to a tethered connection such as from a mobile phone and attempt to reconnect.
- Alt+Tab and restart your PC as soon as the firewall error appears, then attempt to reconnect to game.

EDIT:
While we investigate the cause of the recent rise in firewall errors, it would help us a lot if you could run the network diagnostic tool. This will collect the necessary network details of affected players and hopefully we draw similarities and derive possible solutions.

[Network Diagnostic Tool](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs)

Hi guys 

Okay well i don't know if anyone else has this problem before but anyways.I log into lol like i do every day.I enter a queue like everyone else  does . I find a match i click on accept like normal. Then i select my champion like normal. But this is when the problem starts the lol closes. Then i have to wait about 7 mins for the lol logo to show up. By this time i have been classed as afk which means leave busters. Then once the logo comes up i get loading in but all i can see is my player card and my champion. No others champions just their names. My laptop is two weeks old okay and im on ultra fast broadband. Then the game crashes how am i meant to rank up when i cant even load into the rift .  So far im ready to punch my laptop in half. This is a problem that you need to fix riot. I have spent  over $300 on your game and this happens plz riot fix this. I'm getting sick of getting leave busters cos your game isn't working maybe if you spent more time on fixing your bugs and all the problems with league of legends instead of bringing out new skins maybe this problem wouldn't be happening so plz can you fix this bug. And to anyone who has had this problem plz tell me 



Riot plz contact me at this email plz i want answers


thenewturtle123@hotmail.com 


thank you plz fix this bug

This doesn't sound like an issue with the latest patch but something unique to your laptop. My first thought is something wrong with loading the game into memory but I can't be certain. Please raise a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and provide them with the following logs when you do:

- [r3d logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)
- [dxdiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)
my laptop is like two weeks old i dont think its just on my laptop
It is funny how they assume it is our own fault.
yea its so bs im getting leave busters cos riot cant sort their game out like i said RIOT GENHIRN maybe you guys should psy more time to fixxing bugs then bringing out new skins ffs

It's pretty funny that you guys are idiots and don't realise how hard it is to track down user specific errors that happen because of a one off result of many variables causing a problem. Also the guy you're talking to probably has 0 to do with creating skins and all the oce riot team are doing atm is trying to figure out wtf is going on. Maybe if every single oce player was having the same problem that'd give you merit to say fix your %%%% riot. But jesus computers are complicated things man, stop being a little child about it

For the first time I have the firewall bug. I get to the loading screen and everything goes blank and then a message appears saying I cannot connect and to check my firewall. Nothing has changed on my end. I'm with Telstra NBN.

This is happening in all game modes for me :(

Hello Powerhouse,

Can you run this here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs and then send the results to toxichawk@riotgames.com

We will take a look and get back to you with our findings. Thank you.

Is there anything about the patch that would affect ISPs perhaps NZ specific? I unistalled, re-installed from scratch, and even tried a second machine, downed all fws and again, post patch cannot get from character select to final game load.

> [{quoted}](name=ratheraverage,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=UWunwEot,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-01-16T00:55:57.512+0000)
>
> Is there anything about the patch that would affect ISPs perhaps NZ specific? I unistalled, re-installed from scratch, and even tried a second machine, downed all fws and again, post patch cannot get from character select to final game load.

So I have received (what I believe is your network log), after looking through it the first thing I noticed was your connection within your ISP seems to be having some issues. At times I can see the connection is possibly being dropped within their network.

One of the other things I noticed was your connection couldn't give me a ping result to the google dns servers, which is quite strange.

I would try:
- Rebooting your Modem
- Rebooting PC
- Contacting your ISP and having them check your connection. Explaining your situation

If those things still don't help please let me know and we can do some further tests.

-ToxicHawk

> [{quoted}](name=ratheraverage,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=UWunwEot,comment-id=0002000000010000,timestamp=2015-01-16T03:45:48.253+0000)
>
> those had all been done before even posting. as had flushing ip leases, as requesting qos check from isp
> 
> I can run a 1vs1 game but on exit cannot load stats. Also, it is hard to test when those of us having trouble post patch get leave busted.


So the stats at the end of a 1v1, is normal. They do not show up after low custom games.

In regards to the internet issues. I can only give you feed back on what your trace routes to our servers are telling me. The fact that your connection was having troubles sending packets and getting responses from Google DNS servers really stood out to me as a possible ISP issue.

This is the test from your log file that was sent to me:
> Google: 

>Pinging 8.8.8.8 with 32 bytes of data:
Request timed out.
Request timed out.
Request timed out.
Request timed out.

>Ping statistics for 8.8.8.8:
    Packets: Sent = 4, Received = 0, Lost = 4 (100% loss),

As you can see your connection was unable to receive any packets back.

Now this is the same test from my pc:

>ping 8.8.8.8

>Pinging 8.8.8.8 with 32 bytes of data:
Reply from 8.8.8.8: bytes=32 time=2ms TTL=60
Reply from 8.8.8.8: bytes=32 time=2ms TTL=60
Reply from 8.8.8.8: bytes=32 time=2ms TTL=60
Reply from 8.8.8.8: bytes=32 time=2ms TTL=60

>Ping statistics for 8.8.8.8:
    Packets: Sent = 4, Received = 4, Lost = 0 (0% loss),
Approximate round trip times in milli-seconds:
    Minimum = 2ms, Maximum = 2ms, Average = 2ms

One thing you could possibly try is changing your DNS servers to something other than your default (which is generally your router adn then from your router your ISP.)
An option to try is OpenDNS:
- Primary DNS Server: 208.67.222.222
- Alternate DNS Server: 208.67.220.220

If this resolves your issue it would appear the DNS servers you are routing through is not working as intended.

Alternately a discussion with your ISP would need to be started and further testing with their engineers would need to occur so we can analyze this further.
Thx for looking into the log, still hoping you will fix this please:)

That's possible and we would like to work with you a bit more to better troubleshoot.

Can you run this here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs and then send the results to toxichawk@riotgames.com

We will take a look and get back to you with our findings. We are also looking into this further internally to see if there is an issue affecting more players like you.

Hi, there is this incredibly frustrating bug that occurs everytime a new patch comes out, when i enter the loading screen for the game, a black screen appears, then minimizes itself, then a small image of a plug appears in the top left corner. I can even hear the music playing, but I cant open the game up. I find it odd how it happens for the first game after every single new patch! I am currently in a ranked game, I can hear the music in the background but I cant open league. I've tried restarting windows but that still dosnt work :( I'm going to get punished for this, which I don't deserve.

That's a new one for me. Can you send a screenshot of the plug image? Also, this occurs every time you patch for the first time?

Does it correct itself after the first one?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cochese,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=UWunwEot,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-15T22:17:04.587+0000)
>
> That's a new one for me. Can you send a screenshot of the plug image? Also, this occurs every time you patch for the first time?
> 
> Does it correct itself after the first one?

When I  click on league on my taskbar, the screen goes black then minimizes league, then displays this symbol in the top left h corner.

Yes, it occurs every time I patch for the first time and in all the previous patches it fixes after the first time, however not sure about this time because still sitting in a game started an hour ago that I cant play :(

edit: I'm pretty sure I attached an image twice... not sure why it's not showing up. Just started a custom game and still not working. When I tried a later time it came up with some bugsplat error.

I cannot connect anymore at all. I receive the message "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server. I followed 100% of the troubleshooting on the "[Login Issue page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944#section-windows)" and nothing has fixed my problem.

Hi Riot. Since the last patch I get this weird bug where I can't move or cast spells but I auto attack minions and champs, and thats the only thing I can do. BUT the weird thing is, is that I can look at other champs and see how they cast spells and how they attack and I can literally chat with them. I thought I was the problem, so I checked everything, everything! And that's why i'm 100% sure everything is ok with my internet and PC. I noticed a lot of threds about this issue and i'm shocked that you guys only said that it is our problem. I think you guys should at least try to fix that problem. Thank you.

Hi, so i am having this weird issue where i go to open league of legends then the banner appears in the middle of the screen flickers on and off for a couple seconds and then nothing happens and in my task bar the league icon fads and turns off. Now i was able to play a ranked game this afternoon and i logged of and tried re logging onto find this issue. now i have tried messing with the fix where i delete the rad files and the Air_client Files and all that stuff but that didn't help at all.  Plz help :/

Playing as Nidalee, I jumped over the wall near wolves into the valley sort area, i clearly landed but was then dragged back by a mysterious force. It looked like i had walked straight over the wall

Just wondering if anyone else is getting this??

Hi, I'm having trouble patching for 5.1
It continuously scans files, up to 2000
The progress number shows 33% through the whole thing

playing in a game with an enemy shaco, I was able to see where he blinked to when he used his Q(his stealth). 
It was as though his stealth activated a millisecond too late, always showing me exactly where he had teleported to.

I've noticed this in at least 10 odd games since 5.1, but the base gates randomly seem to allow the opposition team to use them. In normal games I've noticed this to be more likely to happen after an inhibitor has been taken down or if there is someone from your allied team sitting in the invisible spot on the gate. I couldn't 100% reproduce it, but it has been happening a lot. Anyone else notice this?

Getting lots of bugsplats after champ select.

Seems to happen when I have streams/web browser open. Close everything and restarting league fixes it.

Hey all of today my connection has been very unstable with league. I realised when I was dropping axes all over the place as Draven:P I'm considering re installing to try fix..  anyone else getting this? My ping constantly goes up and down from normal ping to around 100/200 then back down then up etc.

Why is no one talking about the zz rot portal being absolutely the most stupid thing ever created. All people have to do is 5 man rush a zz rot portal and its an instant win, honestly if this isn't removed i might actually stop playing league.

Hi Everyone,

I'm not sure if this is a bug or if something odd's going on.  This is an ingame issue with Kennen specifically and Zhonyas.  I've played a couple of games as Kennen tonight since the patch and it seems that Zhonyas is overriding he activation of his Ulti.  Basically I press ulti then zhonas in rapid succession and instead of Ulting through the Zhonyas it instead Zhonyas then ultis afterwards (without me pressing R after the initial cast).  It may be that my reaction speeds are off today but it seems to have happened almost everytime I tried and my sequence has not changed since yesterday. Is there now a longer delay on Kennen's ult starting up in this patch or?
Every couple of weeks/months when a new patch comes out i get the pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped responding bug. Any help?

Hey DarkAngel,

Please try these fixes one at a time and let us know how they go:

- Right click the League of Legends shortcut and then select "Run as administrator".
- Open your LoL folder, usually located at C:\Riot Games\League of Legends, and run lol.launcher.admin.exe.
- Open task manager, then on the process tab select LoLLauncher.exe and click the "End Process" button. Then run the above file again.

1: Did same as before
2: Did same as before
3: Did same as before
4: LoLLauncher.exe does not appear on the processes list, this is what usually fixes it for me but this time it is not appearing.

I really do appreciate your help though. :D

I assume you've done a fair few searches for fixes yourself, so I apologize if you've already tried some of these.

Let's try an old fix from our previous help and support forum:

1. Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system.
2. Right-click 'rads_user_kernal.exe' and select 'Properties'
3. Select the 'Compatibility' tab.
4. Check the box next to 'Run this as an Administrator'.
5. Attempt patch again.

Otherwise try this:

1. Delete the lol_launcher and lol_patcher folders located in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects.
2. Restart PC and without opening anything else (turn off any background programs as well) run the patcher again, the LoL logo will stay there for a while with a little progress bar underneath it. Do not try to run LoL again or any other program, the launcher should eventually appear.
Both of them resulted in the same error.
Why you always assume the problem is on our side. My mates have the same problem. Tried every fix, please fix RIOT:(
Please help with my error, I spent a lot of money on this game and I'm unable to play it!

Sorry Hawkrook, I don't think that this is an issue we can handle here. It may occur once after every patch but it is likely to do with a system resource or configuration on your own PC that is somehow affected by newly patched data. I'd recommend opening a [support ticket ](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new). Please do your best to reply with any information support requests. They may offer some fixes otherwise they will escalate your ticket to our technical specialists.
[Match History missing Player Builds tab.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/chgyitR5-player-build-gone-from-match-history?comment=0001) Webside, not Gameside.
hi my friend had trouble getting in to game he would get to 100% on loading screen then it  would just crash  he closed league rebooted everything but it wouldnt let him connect to the game
{{champion:119}} Axes don't do extra damage.

Well i was just playing reksai and made an invincible tunnel in the dragon pit which was made when Janna was destroying my tunnel on the other side and i tunneled. the timer remained stuck on 0 the whole game and i was still able to ult and tunnel in it, it survived for about 20 minutes untill the game ended. For some reason my screenshot of the game is black :C but the tunnel remained at 0 time remaining for the entire time,
I was just in a game with a Rek'Sai who spawned a tunnel from dragon to tri which lasted the entire game, it didn't expire even though there only supposed to last 10 minutes right?
TEST

So this happened when I tried to join a game today after patching. 
Image attached
In game I can't see what trinket a person has when I select them. However, I can see it when I press tab and look at the score screen.
